pickColour

protected java.awt.Color pickColour(javax.swing.JButton source,
                                    java.lang.String label,
                                    int index)
Bring up a colour selector for the specified colour and set the corresponding colour parameter if the user picks a new one

Parameters:
source - The button that was pressed to produce this action
label - The string to be displayed by the colour dialog
index - The index of the colour parameter to be set
Returns:
The new colour that was chosen or null if the user cancelled.
